MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY14 postcode area of Malpas affecting properties in Wynter Lane and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at  8:35am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:13am on 14th October 2020
